refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These interfaces (auto-generated from the Telepathy spec) make it easier to export objects implementing the Telepathy Channel and its types and optional interfaces, with the correct method and signal signatures, and emit signals from those objects in a type-safe way.

refsect2.title: TpSvcChannel
refsect2.para: Dummy typedef representing any implementation of this interface.

refsect2.title: TpSvcChannelClass
refsect2.para: The class of TpSvcChannel.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_close_impl ()
refsect2.para: The signature of an implementation of the D-Bus method Close on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Channel.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_implement_close ()
refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the Close method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the Close D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_channel_return_from_close ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.
